ORDERS DATA
===========

All orders belong to: John Doe (john.doe@mail.com)

Order 1:
  Date: 2025-10-27 (today)
  Note: Sample order note
  Pictures:
    - Picture ID: 1, Size ID: 1, Quantity: 2
    - Picture ID: 5, Size ID: 3, Quantity: 2

Order 2:
  Date: 2025-10-07 (20 days ago)
  Note: Another sample order
  Pictures:
    - Picture ID: 15, Size ID: 4, Quantity: 5
    - Picture ID: 9, Size ID: 4, Quantity: 10

  Note: (none)
  Pictures:

    - Picture ID: 5, Size ID: 3, Quantity: 2
    - Picture ID: 7, Size ID: 1, Quantity: 10

  Note: (none)
  Pictures:

    - Picture ID: 10, Size ID: 5, Quantity: 2

NOTES:
======
- Total orders: 9
- All orders are from customer John Doe
- Order status is set to "pending" by default
- Each order can contain multiple pictures
- Picture sizes reference the picture_sizes table (IDs 1-7)
- Total price is calculated from: quantity Ã— picture_size_price
